description:
STORY.
Once upon a time, when the world was in peril
It has been said that a messiah will appear in this world.

Two years ago, through a plan called the Messiah's End Project
A certain person tried to bring back the Messiah to the world.
However
Messiah is not a savior.
They were deformed monsters that brought everything to nothing.

The land where the Messiah was resurrected was declared a closed area.
The number of monsters in the quarantined areas continues to grow.
The Messiah cannot be destroyed by conventional weapons.
But one girl was different.
Blessed with the blessings of an angel, her magic was effective against the Messiah.
She "Lydia" was the one who was protected.
This time, he decided to fight against the Messiah as a protector of his own loved ones.
She entered the closed area alone.

[SYSTEM
Use your sword and magic to vanquish your enemies!

Use sword attacks and magic that can be purchased to explore the map and find the bosses in each area!
Bosses will attack you with a variety of attacks!
In exchange for the gold collected from defeating enemies, status upgrades, magic, and enhancement items can be purchased. Some of these items change the way you fight, such as enabling you to backstep. Let's collect items and explore every nook and cranny of the map!

Attention.
With carefully crafted characters, dots, etc., the simple gameplay can be enjoyed by everyone.
